dialogues.line1: You can move by right clicking where you want to go.
An enemy! You can attack by right clicking on them
dialogues.line2: be careful when approaching them, if they detect you, they will strike back!

dialogues.line1: To better avoid being detected, you can enter stealth
To deal with this encounter you will have to use your knife,
dialogues.line2: Press 1 and then click on the enemy to throw your knife. This will kill them instantly!

dialogues.line1: You have three abilities and you can use them with the numbers 1, 2 and 3 of your keyboard.
dialogues.line2: Your ultimate consumes spice to cast. So think before using it

dialogues.line1: You have access to a new character.
dialogues.line2: Press Z to select Zhib and X to select Nerala.
